EmailTemplate.subject: Benchmarking Container Adoption
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRU3AAM]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRU3AAM]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
According to Gartner, there’s a 50% chance your organization will be running containerized applications by 2020. How will you and your team overcome the roadblocks you’ll encounter on the way to deployment and management in production?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRU3AAM]]>
Join the Benchmarking Your Container Adoption in 2019 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRU3AAM]]> webinar on February 20th at 11 am ET where Eva Tuczai, Advanced Solutions Manager, Containers at Turbonomic for a discussion around:
- Current adoption trends - Best practices learned from IT pros that are running containers in production today - The implications for multi-cloud deployments - And more!
Register now and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. Hope to see you there!
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRU3AAM]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
